original_title: Motorists advised to drive with caution on Expressways
original_body_lines: Expressway Traffic Police Division has informed the motorists using the expressways to maintain 50m distance between the vehicles while driving, owing to the adverse weather conditions prevailing across the country.
The Road Development Authority (RDA) has taken steps to display the warnings on electric display boards, Ada Derana reporter said.
Meanwhile, the police also notify drivers to keep the front and rear lights on until they reach their destinations due to the low light conditions.
